case_title: Commissioner of Income-Tax, M.P. vs Dr. Fida Hussain G. Abbasi
judges: P. V. Dixit, K. L. Pandey

legal_questions.question: Whether, on the facts and in the circumstances of the case, the interest paid on loans borrowed for investment in the shares of Ratlam Straw Board Mills (Private) Ltd., which did not yield any dividend income, is allowable as deduction under section 12 of the Income-tax Act, 1922?

Whether, on the facts and in the circumstances of the case, the amount of Rs. 9,422 credited to the account of the assessee in the books of account of Regal Cinema Ltd., East Africa, has been rightly included in the income of the assessee and subject to tax?

facts.assessee_role: Shareholder and director of Ratlam Straw Board Mills (Private) Limited, Ratlam

tribunal_decision: Allowed deduction following Ormerads (India) (Private) Ltd. v. Commissioner of Income-tax (1959) 36 ITR 329

high_court_decision.first_question: Allowed deduction under section 12(2) of the Income-tax Act, 1922
high_court_decision.second_question: Declined to answer due to procedural non-compliance under section 66(1)

references: Ormerads (India) (Private) Ltd. v. Commissioner of Income-tax (1959) 36 ITR 329
Chhail Behari Lal v. Commissioner of Income-tax (1960) 39 ITR 696
